title: !!ONE Month FREE!! Dope East Austin Pad
posting_body: *After the special, this unit has a prorated rent of $2,200*
Check out this brand-new luxury apartment building on East Riverside!
It's less than a $9 Uber from downtown and the airport.
Definitely some of the nicest finish-outs in town!
Dog park on the property for your four-legged friends and they also have a wooded area next to them where you could take your pup on a walk.
They have a state-of-the-art fitness center with multiple rooms including a bike studio and yoga studio.
So you can go ahead and cancel your current gym membership, you won't need it!
*Select unit even have privately fenced-in back yards*
Specials won't last long so text me today to get more info!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
